column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Do n’t you think this is a problem we have in the country with both parties doing it ?
#Text=Well , they have always done it .
#Text=I guess my point is that it ’s the same as it has always been .

#Text=There have been a number of attempts in which referendums have been offered by the minority party , for example in California , to make redistricting more even , and those initiatives have always been the subject of mass media campaigns by the controlling party , and you ’ve usually lost .

#Text=So you end up in the end with the elective representatives of the party sometimes overseen by the judiciary , because you end up with judicial panels redistricting if there is a defective redistricting by the state legislature , but in the end the elected representatives of the states are the people who draw the lines .
#Text=I do n’t know what a valid substitute would be for the elected representatives of the state .
#Text=I say that as a guy coming from a state that is dominated by the opposite party that tries to do my party in .
#Text=On the other hand , those districts are drawn by people who have been elected by the majority of Californians .

#Text=I like the idea of having judicial panels redistrict the states , but I think in the end under this democratic system we have , having the elected representatives do the redistricting is the way it has been done in the past and the way it is going to be done in the future .
#Text=Iran and nuclear capabilities
#Text=The National Intelligence Estimate came out that Iran has not had a nuclear weapons program in years , but the Bush Administration has been warning us that Iran is a threat .
#Text=Do you think these two pieces of information hurt our international standing ?
#Text=No , I do n’t .
#Text=First , I think the National Intelligence Estimate , which I have seen in classified and unclassified form , is flat-out wrong .
#Text=Because a major part of a weapons program is the production of weapons-grade uranium .

#Text=You presently have 2,952 centrifuges refining uranium in Natanz , which is three times as many centrifuges as our intelligence service has estimated until an actual inspection was made by the IAEA .
#Text=But the IAEA and Mohamed ElBaradei have also come out and said that the National Intelligence Estimate jibes with their findings .

#Text=What I ’m saying is that the facts do n’t support the facts as alleged — or represented by this last inspection — do n’t ’ support the conclusion that there is not a weapons program being undertaken .
#Text=A major part of a nuclear device is the refined uranium , which constitutes the explosive matter in a nuclear device .

#Text=If that ’s a major part of the bomb , right now you have almost 3,000 centrifuges producing that material right now in Natanz , Iran , and not only have n’t they slowed down , but they have been increased to three times our former estimate and they are going — according to the last inspection — full bore .
#Text=So if somebody is telling you they are disarming , the next question you want to ask them is , “ Then why are your ammunition factories still in production ? ”
